---
title: "BG GS Nanopore Graphing"
output: html_notebook
---

Imports
```{r}
source("graphFunctions.r")
library("tidyverse")
library("ggplot2")
```

```{r}
df <- read_in_prepped_sam("../nsd_alns/PNK_Treated_Rdata.csv") #From TLS137
```
```{r}

filter(df, ATTRIBUTE=='LENGTH') %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=SAMPLE, y=VALUE)) + geom_boxplot()
```
```{r}
filter(df, SAMPLE=="09_nsdaln.sam" | SAMPLE=="10_nsdaln.sam", ATTRIBUTE=='LENGTH') %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=VALUE, color=SAMPLE)) + geom_density()
```

```{r}
df <- read_in_prepped_sam("../TLS129_nsd_alns/Rformatted_TLS129.csv") #From TLS129

```

```{r}
filter(df, SAMPLE=="02_nsdaln.sam" | SAMPLE=="05_nsdaln.sam" |SAMPLE=="08_nsdaln.sam" | SAMPLE=="11_nsdaln.sam", ATTRIBUTE=='LENGTH') %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=VALUE, color=SAMPLE)) + geom_density()
```
